name: Adamski
description: '''Adam Paul Tinley''' (born 4 December 1967), known professionally as '''Adamski''', as well as '''Sonny Eriksson''', is an English DJ, musician, singer and record producer, prominent at the time of [[acid house]] for his tracks "[[N-R-G (Adamski song)|N-R-G]]" and "[[Killer (Adamski song)|Killer]]", a collaboration with [[Seal (musician)|Seal]], which was a No. 1 song in the UK in 1990.
